com.snap2d.script.lib

Class ScriptTimer

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.snap2d.script.lib.ScriptTimer

  • public class ScriptTimer
extends Object
    Library class initialized and attached by the runtime engine to manage timers created in script code.
    Author:
    Brian Groenke

      • dispose

        public void dispose()
        Stops the timer thread associated with this ScriptTimer object and clears the internal task list. No further calls to #addTimer(int, int, String, Object...) or #cancelTimer(int) will have any effect.
